name: PO Supplier Total
query:
SELECT 
po.name as "PURCHASE ORDER:Link/Purchase Order:200",
po.approved_date as "APPROVED DATE:Data:50",
po.supplier as "SUPPLIER:Data:200",
po.project as "PROJECT:Data:200",
po.base_rounded_total as "TOTAL:Currency:200",
po.total_advance as "ADVANCE:Currency:100",
(po.base_rounded_total-po.total_advance)as "OUTSTATNDING:Currency:100"
FROM `tabPurchase Order` as po 
WHERE po.docstatus=1 and po.naming_series NOT IN ('JOB-.YY.-','SER-.YY.-') and %(group)s='Purchase Order'

UNION

SELECT 
GROUP_CONCAT(po.name) as "PURCHASE ORDER:Link/Purchase Order:100",
"" as "APPROVED DATE:Data:10",
po.supplier as "SUPPLIER:Data:150",
GROUP_CONCAT(distinct(po.project)) as "PROJECT:Data:200",
sum(po.base_rounded_total) as "TOTAL:Currency:150",
sum(po.total_advance) as "ADVANCE:Currency:100",
(sum(po.base_rounded_total)-sum(po.total_advance))as "OUTSTATNDING:Currency:100"
FROM `tabPurchase Order` as po 
WHERE po.docstatus=1 and po.naming_series NOT IN ('JOB-.YY.-','SER-.YY.-') and %(group)s='Supplier' GROUP BY po.supplier
